content: Any chance we could nudge this over the line? I think it's in good shape after @Eric Wieser 's reviews.
Can you merge master into this? The diff is a bit weird, showing some gitignore changes as well as your changes
I'm looking at it right now. I was going to comment that you could do git checkout master .gitignore to revert those changes
That's the type of command that can make things worse; git checkout $(git merge-base HEAD origin/master) .gitignore would be safer, but indeed merging master ought to just work
